website_summaries.verdict: A great value for four silicone baby plates that are still high quality.
pros: Includes four BPA-free silicone plates that are dishwasher safe
Glossy finish helps reduce soap residue
Anti-slip legs help prevent sliding and skidding
cons: These plates do not have suction, so a baby could still pick it up and throw or drop them

customer_reviews.title: Food tinged with dishwasher detergent
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a year. Wash them in the dishwasher. Just recently ate some of my kids leftover food out of one (which I've never done before) and noticed it tastes like the dishwasher detergent. I've been checking them regularly since then and there is always residual detergent on them. Something about them absorbs the dishwasher detergent and doesn't rinse clean. And I do use jet dry. Sick to think that I've been feeding my kids trace amounts of dish detergent for a year.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Great plates, my kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: These silicon plates are great! My kids love them, and I love knowing they're not being poisoned with chemicals. They are bendy and less sturdy than regular plates, but my kids love the colors and compartments, and they're easy to clean. I would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a fun, safe plastic alternative for their children.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: much better than plastic plates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these plates for my granddaughter who is almost 3. They work well, much better than plastic plates. I have washed them by hand and in the dishwasher without any problems. They are sturdy enough so that food does not fall out and the plate does not collapse. There is no suction cup on the bottom but since they are silicone they do stick some to the table and do not easily move around. My granddaughter loves the colors and picks a different one for each meal. Definitely would recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: These have helped us tremendously with our daughter’s meals! She prefers her food separated and now she’ll actually eat most if not all of it because it doesn’t become a mixed up mess. I also love the colors. I gave it four stars because they dry weird in the dishwasher. They always seem to have dried watered spots throughout the whole plate. Could be our dishwasher but it’s the only thing that comes out like that.
customer_reviews.author: Hadassah

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grandkids, Spotty after washing
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors and the materials - the silicone plates are stable and don't move around while the kids are eating from them. What I am not as impressed with is that after washing, they seem to have spots that you can't get rid of. At first I thought it was a film but I think it is just water spots. Maybe it is just the silicone and I know they are clean, they just don't look like it.
customer_reviews.author: KMAX

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these plates and how the bottoms cling to the table so they do not spill easily. My only complaint is that they are on the small side. They should be a bit bigger so older kids can use them too.
customer_reviews.author: SailorEve1112

customer_reviews.title: bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The dishes are more perfect than I could have asked for. I was looking for bowls as well and couldn't find any I like so I only ordered these plates. You do not need a bowl if you buy these plates. The troughs are deep enough to hold a perfect toddler size portion of cereal or soup. They are around an inch deep. And they are thicker and more durable than I expected for the price. They also match beautifully with the RePlay utensil set I bought.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Passes the “pinch test”
customer_reviews.text: These plates pass the “pinch test,” meaning that plastic wasn’t added to the silicone. These plates can be washed in the dishwasher, saving me so much time. I love that I don’t have to worry about my son breaking these plates, as well. I highly recommend these plates!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia H.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible “taste” for the food
customer_reviews.text: Dislike! These plates give a horrible taste to my toddler’s food, it tastes like plastic! We eat the same food, and it’s unbelievable the difference on the flavor! I thought it was just one plate and I gave it another chance, but definitely wouldn’t buy another silicone plate for my kid!
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Viviana Baquero Prada

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Easy to clean, stick to surfaces--so no sliding. The back says, "Responsibly made in China." I tried looking into what this meant and couldn't find any info--not that I doubt it, I would just like to hear more about it. My 2 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.author: jackie Cobbs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like these plates but they are pretty bendy. They are fine if your toddler doesn’t pick their plates up and play with them! Good quality just wish they were a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: RizzyPC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These plates are nice! They're very durable and they kind of stick to the table so my toddler doesn't easily knock it over. My one issue is that we have a dog, and his hair sticks to this like it's tape!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've had these over a year. I think they're great all around. Not sure what other reviewer experienced with cleanliness. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kubly

customer_reviews.title: Nice plates not just for babies.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my older kids (4 and 8) to eat outside in the summer/spring. They are great. Thicker than I thought but nice deep areas for food to sit in. Much better than lots of paper plates.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and bright!
customer_reviews.text: The kids like to choose their color and like that the food is divided. A little hard to wash (occasionally a white film stays on and you have to wash again) but they're sturdy and great indoors and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Have to hand clean
customer_reviews.text: They’re ok. They don’t get very clean in the dishwasher so you need to clean them by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Druberri40

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Silicone Plates
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren really enjoy eating off these colorful plates! Dishwasher safe. Very pleased with these silicone toddler plates.
customer_reviews.author: Nanny Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Total pain to clean
customer_reviews.text: I would love these if thy were easier to clean! My dishwasher leaves a visible film on them and hand washing still produces mixed results. It’s very difficult to get them to rinse clean. Otherwise, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: KateNJ

customer_reviews.title: Great kid friendly plates!
customer_reviews.text: Great plates, super durable and grip well. Easy to clean and my child loves the colors. The only negative is after being in the dishwasher there seems to be soap residue left. A minor inconvenience, I just wipe them with a wet paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: msullivan2

customer_reviews.title: Softer then I was expecting but still nice quality! They slip and slid all over the ...
customer_reviews.text: Softer then I was expecting but still nice quality! They slip and slid all over the high chair top tho but we still like them!
customer_reviews.author: vickie rumbold

customer_reviews.title: Good plates
customer_reviews.text: These are nice plates. They did seem to pass the pinch test like stated. They are something babies/toddler can still pick up and throw so if your looking for a suction type plate these wouldn't be for you. But for me I like them they are stackable and non breakable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Guimond

customer_reviews.title: Nice plates. I usually wash them with hands
customer_reviews.text: Nice plates. I usually wash them with hands. They are pretty easy to move and pick up for my 10 month old which is not ideal. Would have been 5 stars if they actually stuck to the table like advertised.
customer_reviews.author: mehreen

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean and stays on the table really well
customer_reviews.text: We use these for every meal/snack for my son. They’re perfect because they don’t slide around on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Dion

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Love that this one came with four plates. My only complaint is that you do have to prescrub them before you put them in the dishwasher, where as with the previous set I purchased I didnt have to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey McInturf

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like soap/chemical
customer_reviews.text: I eventually just threw these away. It had a bad taste after being washed and rinsed SEVERAL TIMES!!! I do not reccommend, and please sample your kids products before using on them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenya

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: purchased to donate to local family homeless shelter, they were just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Champion

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stayed in place pretty well and washed great on top rack of dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Leaves soapy taste
customer_reviews.text: I too have used these for a year and have noticed a strong soapy taste in the my child’s food. We are so disappointed and worried about how long this has actually been going on!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved the price, even better was the scilicone. I thought, “there has to be a catch to get 4 scilicone plates for the great price.” There was no catch! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty & Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Plates get stained
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really liked it. Plates get stained with curry & after cleaning if I try to wipe it dry, it gets dirty. Thinking of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Indushree

customer_reviews.title: They fit in to each other for easy stacking
customer_reviews.text: I usually use EZPZ silicone plates but these are a tad deeper and stack. The stacking is an amazing space saver!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great! They do not slip off surfaces and the plates are super easy to clean. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy P.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and bendable
customer_reviews.text: These plates are soft, rubbery and they bend. I didn't expect this but it will make them easier to keep on a highchair tray. Haven't used them yet, since they're for grandkids that aren't here each day, but I think they'll be durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality! Perfect size for my 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality and cute plates. They work great for my 1 year old.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaO

customer_reviews.title: Best around
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome! They have a little weight to them which works great from regular plates that just slide!
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying it
customer_reviews.text: I use non fragrance dish soap still After first wash it started to smell like soap. Food also started to smell.
customer_reviews.author: Fareen

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable but food taste like soap!
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 5 stars HOWEVER THEY MAKE MY SONS FOOD TASTE LIKE SOAP :( stopped using them and unfortunately am looking to buy something wlse
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Janeiro

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Heating food in one side leaves temp neutral on others. Great for hot/cold food combinations
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Provenzano

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Love the size for toddler use and they clean up easily. The colors are super fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara Hylton

customer_reviews.title: My favorite plate
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean! My son loves them. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler divided plates
customer_reviews.text: These plates stay put, don't slide around. Depth is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Not up to par
customer_reviews.text: They are a little flimsy and they don't stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bussey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! They dont take a lot of space, easy to wash , no odor from the material ... its great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddler plates
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. Good quality....my 3 yr old grandson loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Calonda B.

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I like that they are able to go in the microwave and dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These bowls/ plates are the best. Easy to clean and got everything you need. Great colors and clean nicely in the dishwasher (top rack) the colors are great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Most annoying plates!
customer_reviews.text: 1. I am frustrated that these "dishwasher-safe" plates really need to be washed by hand or they come out of the DW with spots (never had this problem with other dishes). Not to mention, they have a lot of corners and the rim is difficult to clean. 2. They are flimsy. If you hold one with food in 1 hand, it folds over and dumps the food on the floor. What parent has time to dedicate two hands to one child's plate?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for toddlers and convenient
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic for our toddler twin granddaughters. We do not have to worry about broken dishes. The twins love the colors and like eating from the plates, especially convenient because they have dividers. Love that I can place in the dishwasher too.
customer_reviews.author: Kaggy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to wash
customer_reviews.text: Food stains on them if you don't immediately wash off. Also leaves white soap stains both hand washing and in the washer. I love the idea of these plates but would not purchase this kind/brand again.
customer_reviews.author: KLA

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Had to plan quickly for a dinner with children. Ordered on Wednesday and arrived in plenty of time for dinner Saturday. Worked out well for the 5 and unders to eat.
customer_reviews.author: melstl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these because they clean so easily. Quick clean in the sink or easy to stick on the dishwasher. Can be thrown around too haha!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these plates and so does the grandson!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we were looking for our grandson. These are nice, heavy plates that do not slip. They also quite deep. Excellent quality and at an affordable price! Thanks for offering them!
customer_reviews.author: V. Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for portion control for dieting. Great value, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Plates
customer_reviews.text: These work well for my toddler. I wish they were slightly more sturdy, as you can basically fold them in half. But they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I had invisioned the plates yo be slightly larger.. otherwise they are perfect and will work nicely
customer_reviews.author: surely

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Love these plates. They are the perfect size. The only way they could have been better is if my little one couldn't pick it up and toss it .
customer_reviews.author: Yonkers NY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. Durable and not easily spilled. Great colors.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: DURABILITY
customer_reviews.text: WORKS PERFECTLY FOR MY TWO GRANCHILDREN, THEY LOVE THEM AS DOES THEIR MOTHER AT CLEAN UP TIME.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: toddler plates
customer_reviews.text: I love these plates I ordered them for my grandkids and they worked out perfect for what I need them for. Very sturdy dishwasher safe and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: Great plates, great value. My only complaint is that they should be made in the USA, not China.
customer_reviews.author: JW

product_meta.title: Set of 4 Divided Toddler Plates Set for Baby Plate, Passes Pinch Test, Kids, Children, BPA Free Silicone for Feeding by Salbree (7.5 inches Round, Green, Light Blue, Orange, Purple)
product_meta.description:
Size:7.5" Round| Color:Green, Light Blue, Orange, PurpleThe Salbree divided plates are a great alternative to the suction placemats on the market today and are extremely safe for you #1 asset, your children! We take safety to a much higher level than our competition. And if that is not enough for you, check out our other benefits.


Made of 100% silicone-which means they are soft and unbreakable and yes, they pass "the pinch" test.

Anti-bacterial and soap scum elimination- We made the 3 dish bowls with a less porous, glossy finish. This which helps reduce bacteria even more and also helps eliminate soap scum.

Tested and certified-When it comes to your children, no product can be too safe. Our plates are tested for harmful chemicals by a Consumer Product Safet Commision, accredited laboratory and are CPSIA (Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act) compliant. Before you purchase any baby products, you should ask the seller to see their CPC (Consumer Product Certificate). 


If the extra safety isn't enough, check out these other value-added,HUGE benefits.


Get 4 divided toddler plates to set- many other offers only have 3 plates to a set, we add extra value by adding a 4th plate to our set 

Added anti-skid performance- we took extra steps to increase the anti-slip performance. First, we widened the 3 legs on the bottom of the plate, increasing the overall area that comes into contact with the table. Secondly, we polished the feet, further increasing the surface area that comes into contact with the table.

Will make your child happy- your child will be happier with a smiling plate looking at them 


We understand that you work hard for your money and want to get the most for it. That is why Salbree, offers you a better product at a lower price. If you have any questions, please ask. 

BUY YOURS TODAY!!!
feature_bullets: MORE FOR YOUR MONEY - get 4 dishes for the price of 3 with Salbree microwave safe dinnerware plate sets
SAFER FOR YOUR TODDLERS - 3 polished food bowls reduces bacteria and prevents soap residue, a common problem
MAKES YOUR CHILDREN HAPPY - boys, girls, kids and adults will enjoy our smiley plate tableware
LESS FOOD ON THE FLOOR - extra wide legs and polished legs offer anti slip and anti skid features
100% SILICONE & SAFE FOR YOUR CHILD - Our plates are CPSIA compliant, they're tested for harmful chemicals

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars115 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
